ygData.subject: Important Events and a broken heart

(Sorry Yanshosh. I hadn't posted since Saturday, so I had alot of 
messages to go through. I know you posted before Saturday but I 
forgot about his answer. Sorry again.)

Brix/Fliq

"Okay than. Let's go rip the hull off."

As the three began to walk off towards the hull, Fliq looked to 
Ramulus. His thoughts had often been going towards him in the last 
little bit. He thought his life was bad. He watched as those he cared 
about died, and now can no longer travel through space. But 
Ramulus...Ramulus had never even seen Cybertron! Past Earth is all 
he's known. And on top of it, he died! His Spark actually left his 
body for awhile. Fliq continued to walk, reflecting on how he should 
be happy with his life.
______________________________________________________________________

Starscream stood by KitKat's door, and heard her conversation with 
Drillbit, and how they were much in love. When KitKat had ordered him 
around, he felt a little crush on her. She knew who he was, but 
wouldn't just roll over because of who he was. The old Starscream 
would have bargined in their, blaster Drillbit and taken KitKat for 
his. But not now. He understood they were in love. He would leave 
them alone.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois landed at the secret entrance to the tunnel.

"Should I go ahead? No, I should wait for them. They'll never find 
their way. There are so many other directions, it will be hard for 
them to follow. I'll wait until they catch up."

Starscream walked off towards his post.
